children.text: The optimal strategy is to buy the x items that are the most expensive (so that the free items are as expensive as possible) because the free items are the cheapest ones in the purchased set.

children.text: However, note that the free items are the cheapest ones, so we want the purchased set to have the largest possible y cheapest items.
